TunableList.name: FAMILY_RELATIONS_FIXUP
TunableList.description: Relationship to give between premade Sims or Ancestors.

Tunable.name: apply_on_legacy_saves
Tunable.description: This relation will be applied even if the sims are already present in the save.

TunableList.name: flag
TunableList.description: FamilyRelationBitFlag to add from sim_a to sim_b ex: Sim_A Parent of Sim_B

Tunable.name: sim_a
Tunable.description: Family Relationship to create from sim_a to sim_b (sim_a being parent of sim_b)

Tunable.name: sim_b
Tunable.description: Family Relationship to create that sim_b will receive from sim_a (sim_b becoming child of sim_a if flag is Parent)

TunableList.name: RELATIONSHIP_MAP
TunableList.description: Relationship to give between premade Sims in different households.

TunableTuple.description: Two Sims and a loot. The two Sims must be in different premade households, and there can only be one entry per pair of Sims.

Tunable.name: relationship_loot
Tunable.description: Loot that contains relationship to add between the two Sims. Sim A is Actor and Sim B is TargetSim.

Tunable.name: sim_a
Tunable.description: Relationship Loot uses this Sim as Actor.

Tunable.name: sim_b
Tunable.description: Relationship Loot uses this Sim as TargetSim.
